p: NCI-H441 cells (ATCC, Manassas, VA, USA) were seeded on the opposite side of the membrane (epithelial chamber) with a density of 2.7 × 10 5 NCI-H441/cm 2. Cells were cultured for 3 d until confluency with a daily media exchange. The NCI-H441 medium was supplemented with 1 µM dexamethasone (Sigma-Aldrich, Munich, Germany).
